script: setTimeout(function() {var skills = [100, 95, 60, 30, 20, 20];Array.prototype.forEach.call(document.querySelectorAll(".skills h4"), function(skill, i) {skill.style.width = skills[i] + "%"; skill.children[0].addEventListener("click", function() { fn.route("contact/"); }); });}, 500);
content:

Hi, I'm Adrian Cooney

A web developer and designer.

I'm based in Cavan, Ireland and working freelance. I'm just after completing the Leaving Certificate and will (hopefully) be attend NUIG to study Mathematical Science, if all goes well. I love art and illustration. I usually hang out and around any design websites I manage to come across. Anything to do with incorparating Maths, Art and code.

I specialize in web development with technologies such as HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript. I can build for Wordpress and OpenCart and use frameworks such as HydrogenPHP, Ruby on Rails and Node.js. I have experience in using most programming languages and can manage a server. I build fast, responsive web applications that utilize the modern technologies of todays browsers. Internet Explorer support (< IE9) is available on request.
